Title: Prohibits the percentage of disbursements from the state lottery fund that goes towards education aid from falling below 45.15%
Summary: Prohibits the percentage of disbursements from the state lottery fund that goes towards education aid from falling below 45.15 percent.
LawCode: Amd ยง92-c, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the percentage of education aid disbursed from the state lottery fund
